name: Hit the apple, save princess!
description:
Hit The Apple is a fun archery game in which you have to hit an apple off of a princess's head with a bow and arrow.

If you miss, the princess turns into a witch!

The first level of Hit The Apple places you quite close to the princess. If you hit the apple successfully without shooting the princess then you move to the next level, where you'll be placed a little further away from the target, and so on. Hit the princess and it's game over. Miss the apple and the princess and you get to try the level over.


2 Ways to Control the intensity of the draw:
1) by distance
2) by push time
